Thurs., Sept. 13: Learn more about our efforts to defend voting rights.
  


All-Member Call on Voting Rights

Thursday, Sept. 13, 12:30 p.m.

For conference call information, email rsvp@aclupa.org by Tuesday, Sept. 11.

RSVP by Email

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

If you haven't already registered, there is still time for you to sign up to join our special All-Member Conference Call on Voting Rights in PA and beyond.

ACLU-PA Associate Director Sara Mullen and Deputy Legal Director Mary Catherine Roper will share our efforts to protect access to the polls and election integrity here in Pennsylvania and update members on important voting rights litigation and advocacy in other critical states.

We'll also discuss our #votesmartjustice initiative, which aims to hold elected officials accountable for their positions on criminal justice reform and ending mass incarceration.

To RSVP and for conference call information, email rsvp@aclupa.org by Tuesday, September 11.

We look forward to having you on the call!

Sincerely,

ACLU of Pennsylvania
